title: Subconscious Desire
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: Subconscious Desire
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares thoughts on why Bills-Chiefs may be the most exciting QB matchup ever in the league (1:00), what makes Tennessee’s victory over Alabama this past weekend such a big deal (13:53), and why his visit back to Clark Atlanta this past weekend made him think harder about 60 Minutes’ feature on Jackson State coach Deion Sanders (23:16). Plus, an IYHH including Police using DNA to generate 3D images of suspects (30:16) and your voicemails from bad loans you have got yourself into (40:46).


  1. @chloexiang shares police are using DNA to generate 3D images of suspects they’ve never seen: https://bit.ly/3EMtnki
  2. @erikaedwardsnbc shares that U.S. hospitals brace for an unprecedented winter of viruses: https://nbcnews.to/3MCoqfQ
  3. @carmenmolina_a shares how artificial intelligence could soon diagnose illness based on your voice: https://n.pr/3TvXCQT
